import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{useFavorites}from'../context/FavoriteContext';import LocationBasedRecommendation from'../components/LocationBasedRecommendation';import{restaurantAPI}from'../services/api';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const{currentUser}=useAuth();const{addToFavorites,removeFromFavorites,isInFavorites}=useFavorites();const[selectedRestaurant,setSelectedRestaurant]=useState(null);const[showModal,setShowModal]=useState(false);const[topRestaurants,setTopRestaurants]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);// Î∞±ÏóîÎìú ÏÑúÎ≤Ñ ÏÉÅÌÉúÏôÄ DB Ïó∞Í≤∞ ÏÉÅÌÉú ÌôïÏù∏ (ÎûúÎî©ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄ Î°úÎìú ÏôÑÎ£å ÌõÑ)
